text:
October 4, 2022
The IRS will soon mail letters on behalf of the Center for Medicare & Medicaid Services, sharing information about obtaining Marketplace healthcare coverage.The letters will be mailed to specific individuals informing them that they may be eligible to get help paying for health insurance by signing up through the HealthCare.gov website.
HealthCare.gov
The IRS cannot answer questions about these letters. Anyone who receives Letter 6534, 6534-A or 6534-B and needs health insurance should call the Marketplace Call Center at 800-318-2596 or visit HealthCare.gov.
800-318-2596
HealthCare.gov
